cells.data:
Erosion necessitates fast rotation rate (for winds) and a temperature permitting a liquid substance (usually water)

Thinner lithosphere = more volcanoes, plate tectonics

### Tidal Heating

Io is tidally locked to Jupiter, causing the points facing it to experience greater gravity than others. This stretches the moon slightly. It also changes *how* stretched out Io is, depending on whether it is at the aphelion or perihelion

This heats up Io in a process called tidal heating

Larger eccentricity means more elliptical orbit, which means more tidal heating
Larger orbits mean less tidal heating
Larger diameter means more mass means more gravity means more tidal heating

Venus probably went through a runaway greenhouse effect

REMINDER TO DOUBLE CHECK PPT
